attributes.additional_details:
At present we who live on the Wirral in particular in Neston, Little Neston, Parkgate and all surrounding areas are being plagued by salt marsh mosquitoes, over the past few years this problem has been getting worse due to the local authourities not spraying insecticide to assist with the irradication of the mosquitoes in the area.
We the local parishioners, want the government to assist the local authority in whatever ways possible in order to irradicate the mosquito problem so that local people can feel free and safe to enjoy the local environment without being bitten and infected via desease carrying blood sucking insects.
I would like to direct this petition in particular to my local MP Mr Andrew Miller, MP for Ellesmere Port and Neston.
